Package edu.rit.numeric.plot

Package edu.rit.numeric.plot provides classes and interfaces for plotting data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dots
    Class Dots provides operations for creating several common shapes of dots for plotting points.
    Plot
    Class Plot is a class for creating and displaying a plot.
    Strokes
    Class Strokes provides operations for creating several common patterns of drawing strokes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Plot.AxisKind
    Enum Plot.AxisKind enumerates the possible kinds of axis on a Plot.

Package edu.rit.numeric.plot Description

Package edu.rit.numeric.plot provides classes and interfaces for plotting data. The plots can be displayed on screen or stored into files in various formats.
